title: Scientists have discovered the tiniest dinosaur in the world
description: An international team of scientists have discovered a tiny new species of dinosaur  believed to be the smallest on record  Named Oculudentavis khaungraae  the diminutive bird s skull measures only     milimetres  less than the width of a thumbnail and smal
